Summary: Was moving very slowly a bluish/white at times VERY BRIGHT starlike with dimension
divs: Sighting DetailsIN Lagrange at a friends house and came outside to smoke a cigarette. Looked up and noticed this object that was very bright almost star like. It was ascending and descending. Pulsating. My reaction was calm since I have been watching these things for awhile now. I eventually left my friendws house and it was close to dawn so it was getting lighter outside and I lost sight of it.
trends: There have been no other sightings in La Grange
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
